category: news
title: "Google looks to replace third-party cookies with privacy-friendly AI alternative"
excerpt: "Third-party cookies are a commonly used type of cookie that advertisers rely on to track what websites users visit and target them with personalized ads. Earlier this month, Google said that it plans to phase them out in Chrome within two years."
